action.content:
Infer the date from context.

Q: Today is Christmas Eve of 1937. What is the date 10 days ago in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 12/14/2026
(B) 12/14/1950
(C) 12/14/2007
(D) 12/14/1937
(E) 07/14/1938
(F) 12/14/1988
A: (D)

Q: Tomorrow is 11/12/2019. What is the date one year ago from today in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 09/04/2018
(B) 11/11/2018
(C) 08/25/2018
(D) 11/02/2018
(E) 11/04/2018
A: (B)

Q: Jane and John married on Jan 2, 1958. It is their 5-year anniversary today. What is the date tomorrow in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 01/11/1961
(B) 01/03/1963
(C) 01/18/1961
(D) 10/14/1960
(E) 01/03/1982
(F) 12/03/1960
A: (B)

Q: Jane got her job in 2016. Today is her 3-year work anniversary. She still remember that on Dec 2, her second day at work, she spilled coffee on her laptop. What is the date tomorrow in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 08/02/2020
(B) 12/02/1950
(C) 11/18/2019
(D) 12/02/2019
(E) 01/02/2020
(F) 12/01/2019
A:
action.label: context

action.content:
Q: The target grid has a pattern where the first and last rows are identical, and the second and fourth rows are identical. The third row is the only one that is different. In the third row, the first and last cells are empty, and the second and fourth cells are filled with X. The middle cell is empty. What is the pattern of the third row in the target grid?
Options:
(A) ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
(B) ▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
(C) ▢ X ▢ X ▢
(D) ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
A: (B)||
action.label: response
